title: Sunset Blvd.
description: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

title: Rebecca
description: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

title: Double Indemnity
description: A Los Angeles insurance representative lets an alluring housewife seduce him into a scheme of insurance fraud and murder that arouses the suspicion of his colleague, an insurance investigator.

title: The Third Man
description: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

title: Strangers on a Train
description: A psychopath forces a tennis star to comply with his theory that two strangers can get away with murder.

title: The Maltese Falcon
description: San Francisco private detective Sam Spade takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette, with the stakes rising after his partner is murdered.

title: The Night of the Hunter
description: A religious fanatic marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real daddy hid the $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.

title: Touch of Evil
description: A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping, and police corruption in a Mexican border town.

title: The Leopard Man
description: A seemingly tame leopard used for a publicity stunt escapes and kills a young girl, spreading panic throughout a sleepy New Mexico town.

title: Niagara
description: As two couples are visiting Niagara Falls, tensions between one wife and her husband reach the level of murder.

title: Don't Bother to Knock
description: After being dumped by his girlfriend, an airline pilot pursues a babysitter in his hotel and gradually realizes she's dangerous.

title: Mildred Pierce
description: A hard-working mother inches towards disaster as she divorces her husband and starts a successful restaurant business to support her spoiled daughter.

title: Notorious
description: The daughter of a convicted Nazi spy is asked by American agents to gather information on a ring of Nazi scientists in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

title: Brighton Rock
description: In Brighton in 1935, small-time gang leader Pinkie Brown murders a journalist and later desperately tries to cover his tracks but runs into trouble with the police, a few witnesses, and a rival gang.

title: Gilda
description: A small-time gambler hired to work in a Buenos Aires casino discovers his employer's new wife is his former lover.

title: The Lady from Shanghai
description: Fascinated by gorgeous Mrs. Bannister, seaman Michael O'Hara joins a bizarre yachting cruise, and ends up mired in a complex murder plot.

title: The Big Sleep
description: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a wealthy family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail, and what might be love.

title: Act of Violence
description: An embittered, vengeful POW stalks his former commanding officer who betrayed his men's planned escape attempt from a Nazi prison camp.

title: The Killing
description: Crook Johnny Clay assembles a five-man team to plan and execute a daring racetrack robbery.

title: Shadow of a Doubt
description: A teenage girl, overjoyed when her favorite uncle comes to visit the family in their quiet California town, slowly begins to suspect that he is in fact the "Merry Widow" killer sought by the authorities.

title: Nightmare Alley
description: The rise and fall of Stanton Carlisle, a mentalist whose lies and deceit prove to be his downfall.

title: The Asphalt Jungle
description: A major heist goes off as planned, but then double crosses, bad luck and solid police work cause everything to unravel.

title: To Have and Have Not
description: During World War II, American expatriate Harry Morgan helps transport a French Resistance leader and his beautiful wife to Martinique while romancing a sensuous lounge singer.

title: Scarface
description: An ambitious and nearly insane violent gangster climbs the ladder of success in the mob, but his weaknesses prove to be his downfall.

title: Laura
description: A police detective falls in love with the woman whose murder he is investigating.

title: Shanghai Express
description: A notorious woman rides a train through a dangerous situation with a British captain she loved.

title: Suspicion
description: A shy young heiress marries a charming gentleman, and soon begins to suspect he is planning to murder her.

title: Island of Lost Souls
description: A mad doctor conducts ghastly genetic experiments on a remote island in the South Seas, much to the fear and disgust of the shipwrecked sailor who finds himself trapped there.

title: Time Without Pity
description: The day before a young man is to be executed for killing his girlfriend, his alcoholic father shows up to try to prove his innocence.

title: Walk the Dark Street
description: A big-game hunter seeks revenge upon the Army officer whom he believes caused the death of his brother.

title: The Red House
description: An old man and his sister are concealing a terrible secret from their adopted teen daughter, concerning a hidden abandoned farmhouse, located deep in the woods.

title: The Stranger
description: An investigator from the War Crimes Commission travels to Connecticut to find an infamous Nazi.

title: Key Largo
description: A man visits his war buddy's family hotel and finds a gangster running things. As a hurricane approaches, the two end up confronting each other.

title: Spellbound
description: A psychiatrist protects the identity of an amnesia patient accused of murder while attempting to recover his memory.

title: Out of the Past
description: A private eye escapes his past to run a gas station in a small town, but his past catches up with him. Now he must return to the big city world of danger, corruption, double crosses, and duplicitous dames.

title: The Phenix City Story
description: A crime-busting lawyer and his initially reluctant attorney father take on the forces that run gambling and prostitution in their small Southern town.

title: The Enforcer
description: A crusading district attorney finally gets a chance to prosecute the organizer and boss of Murder Inc.

title: Sweet Smell of Success
description: Powerful but unethical Broadway columnist J.J. Hunsecker coerces unscrupulous press agent Sidney Falco into breaking up his sister's romance with a jazz musician.

title: In a Lonely Place
description: A potentially violent screenwriter is a murder suspect until his lovely neighbor clears him. However, she soon starts to have her doubts.

title: Where the Sidewalk Ends
description: Det. Sgt. Mark Dixon wants to be something his old man wasn't: a guy on the right side of the law. Will Dixon's vicious nature get the better of him?

title: Ace in the Hole
description: A frustrated former big-city journalist now stuck working for an Albuquerque newspaper exploits a story about a man trapped in a cave to rekindle his career, but the situation quickly escalates into an out-of-control circus.

title: The Man Who Cheated Himself
description: A veteran homicide detective who has witnessed his socialite girlfriend kill her husband sees his newly-minted detective brother assigned to the case alongside him.

title: The Killers
description: Hit men kill an unresisting victim, and investigator Reardon uncovers his past involvement with beautiful, deadly Kitty Collins.

title: Boomerang!
description: The true story of a prosecutor's fight to prove the innocence of a man accused of a notorious murder.

title: Killer's Kiss
description: Ready to catch a train to his hometown, a washed-up boxer tells us about the strange and twisty events that happened to him the past couple of days.

title: The Big Heat
description: Tough cop Dave Bannion takes on a politically powerful crime syndicate.

title: Gun Crazy
description: Two disturbed young people release their fascination with guns through a crime spree.

title: White Heat
description: A psychopathic criminal with a mother complex makes a daring break from prison and leads his old gang in a chemical plant payroll heist.

title: Leave Her to Heaven
description: A writer falls in love with a young socialite and they're soon married, but her obsessive love for him threatens to be the undoing of them both as well as everyone around them.

title: The Postman Always Rings Twice
description: A married woman and a drifter fall in love, then plot to murder her husband.

title: The Hitch-Hiker
description: Two fishermen pick up a psychopathic escaped convict who tells them that he intends to murder them when the ride is over.

title: Scarlet Street
description: A man in mid-life crisis befriends a young woman, though her fiancé persuades her to con him out of the fortune they mistakenly assume he possesses.

title: The Wrong Man
description: In 1953, an innocent man named Christopher Emanuel "Manny" Balestrero is arrested after being mistaken for an armed robber.

title: Detour
description: Chance events trap hitchhiking nightclub pianist Al Roberts in a tightening net of death, deception and blackmail.

title: Angels with Dirty Faces
description: A priest tries to stop a gangster from corrupting a group of street kids.

title: Kiss Me Deadly
description: A doomed female hitchhiker pulls Mike Hammer into a deadly whirlpool of intrigue, revolving around a mysterious "great whatsit".

title: Each Dawn I Die
description: A corrupt D.A. (Thurston Hall) with political ambitions is angered by news stories implicating him in criminal activity and decides to frame the reporter (James Cagney) for manslaughter in order to silence him.

title: House of Strangers
description: After years in prison, Max promises revenge on his brothers for their betrayal. His lover Irene and memories of his past yield him a broader perspective.

title: Stranger on the Third Floor
description: An aspiring reporter is the key witness at the murder trial of a young man accused of cutting a café owner's throat and is soon accused of a similar crime himself.

title: The Lost Weekend
description: The desperate life of a chronic alcoholic is followed through a four-day drinking bout.

title: D.O.A.
description: Frank Bigelow, told he's been poisoned and has only a few days to live, tries to find out who killed him and why.

title: The Roaring Twenties
description: Three men attempt to make a living in Prohibitionist America after returning home from fighting together in World War I.

title: The Face Behind the Mask
description: A disfigured watch-maker with a grudge against society embarks on a life of crime.

title: The Fallen Idol
description: A butler working in a foreign embassy in London falls under suspicion when his wife accidentally falls to her death, the only witness being an impressionable young boy.

title: The Two Mrs. Carrolls
description: An artist forms an attachment with a woman on holiday in the country. As the relationship develops, his behavior and information about his past cause her increasing concern.

title: Fallen Angel
description: A slick con man arrives in a small town looking to make some money, but soon gets more than he bargained for.

title: Dark Passage
description: A man convicted of murdering his wife escapes from prison and works with a woman to try to prove his innocence.

title: Stage Fright
description: A struggling actress tries to help a friend prove his innocence after he's accused of murdering the husband of a high-society entertainer.

title: Marked Woman
description: A crusading district attorney persuades a clip joint hostess to testify against her mobster boss after her innocent sister is accidentally murdered during one of his unsavory parties.

title: Detective Story
description: On one day in the 21st Precinct squad room, assorted characters form a backdrop for the troubles of hard-nosed Detective Jim McLeod.

title: Pickup on South Street
description: A pickpocket unwittingly lifts a message destined for enemy agents and becomes a target for a Communist spy ring.

title: The Naked City
description: A step-by-step look at a murder investigation on the streets of New York.

title: The Hoodlum
description: Paroled sociopath and career criminal Vincent Lubeck betrays his family's trust when he masterminds a complex armored car robbery.

title: The Desperate Hours
description: Three escaped convicts move in on and terrorize a suburban household.

title: Thunder Road
description: A veteran comes home from the Korean War to the mountains and takes over the family moonshining business. He has to battle big-city gangsters who are trying to take over the business and the police who are trying to put him in prison.

title: I Love Trouble
description: A wealthy man hires a detective to investigate his wife's past. The detective (Franchot Tone) discovers that the wife had been a dancer and left her home town with an actor. The latter is killed before he can talk, but, with the help of a showgirl, the detective learns that the wife had used stolen papers from a girl friend to enter college after she had stolen $40,00...

title: Sorry, Wrong Number
description: While on the telephone, an invalid woman overhears what she thinks is a murder plot and attempts to prevent it.

title: High Sierra
description: After being released from prison, notorious thief Roy Earle is hired by his old boss to help a group of inexperienced criminals plan and carry out the robbery of a California resort.

title: All the King's Men
description: The rise and fall of a corrupt politician, who makes his friends richer and retains power by dint of a populist appeal.

title: Clash by Night
description: Mae Doyle comes back to her hometown a cynical woman. Her brother Joe fears that his love, fish cannery worker Peggy, may wind up like Mae. Mae marries Jerry and has a baby; she is happy but restless, drawn to Jerry's friend Earl.

title: Kiss of Death
description: Nick Bianco is caught during a botched jewellery heist. The prosecution offer him a more lenient sentence if he squeals on his accomplices but he doesn't roll over on them. Three years into the sentence an event changes his mind.

title: The Woman in the Window
description: A conservative middle aged professor engages in a relationship with a femme fatale, he's plunged into a nightmarish world of blackmail and murder.

title: Dead End
description: The lives of a young man, a young woman, an infamous gangster, and a group of street kids converge one day in a volatile New York City slum.

title: The Harder They Fall
description: An ex-sportswriter is hired by a shady fight promoter to promote his latest find, an unknown but easily exploitable rising star from Argentina.

title: Please Murder Me!
description: A lawyer suffers a guilt complex after getting a murder acquittal for his client, and then finding out she did commit the crime.

title: Brute Force
description: At a tough penitentiary, prisoner Joe Collins plans to rebel against Captain Munsey, the power-mad chief guard.

title: No Way Out
description: Two hoodlums, brothers, are shot and wounded during an attempted robbery. They are taken to a nearby hospital where one brother dies. The surviving brother, a rabid racist, blames the African-American doctor for his death.

title: Jeopardy
description: A family vacationing on the coast of Mexico have to cope with multiple threats to their safety.

title: Murder, My Sweet
description: After being hired to find an ex-con's former girlfriend, Philip Marlowe is drawn into a deeply complex web of mystery and deceit.

title: Stray Dog
description: During a sweltering summer, a rookie homicide detective tries to track down his stolen Colt pistol.

title: The Strange Love of Martha Ivers
description: A man is reunited with his childhood friend and her husband, who believe he knows the truth about the death of her rich aunt years earlier.

title: Caught
description: An ambitious young LA department store model gets her wish of marrying a millionaire but she eventually discovers that rich life isn't always a happy one.

title: Night and the City
description: A small-time grifter and nightclub tout takes advantage of some fortuitous circumstances and tries to become a big-time player as a wrestling promoter.

title: Side Street
description: A struggling young father-to-be gives in to temptation and impulsively steals money from the office of a shady lawyer--with catastrophic consequences.

title: Kind Lady
description: Mary Herries (Ethel Barrymore) has a passion for art and fine furniture. Even though she is getting on in years, she enjoys being around these priceless articles. One day she meets a strange young painter named Harry Springer Elcott (Maurice Evans), who uses his painting skill to enter into her life. Little does she expect that his only interest in her is to covet eve...

title: The Strange Woman
description: In 1820s New England beautiful but poor and manipulative Jenny Hager marries rich old man Isaiah Poster but also seduces his son and his company foreman.

title: Dead Reckoning
description: A soldier runs away rather than receive the Medal of Honor, so his buddy gets permission to investigate, and love and death soon follow.

title: Pushover
description: An undercover police officer falls for the beautiful moll of a bank robber on the run, and together they plan to double-cross the hood and the cops.

title: A Kiss Before Dying
description: A ruthless college student resorts to murder in an attempt to marry an heiress.

title: The Letter
description: The wife of a rubber plantation administrator shoots a man to death and claims it was self-defense, but a letter in her own hand may prove her undoing.

title: Scandal Sheet
description: The editor of an exploitation newspaper commits a murder and assigns his protégé to investigate hoping to divert attention away from himself.

title: The Blue Dahlia
description: An ex-bomber pilot is suspected of murdering his unfaithful wife.

title: I Want to Live!
description: A prostitute, sentenced to death for murder, pleads her innocence.

title: The Turning Point
description: Jerry McKibbon is a tough, no nonsense reporter, mentoring special prosecutor John Conroy in routing out corrupt officials in the city, which may even include Conroy's own police detective father as a suspect.

title: Hangmen Also Die!
description: After the Nazi administrator of Czechoslovakia is shot, his assassin tries to elude the Gestapo and struggles with his impulse to give himself up as hostages are executed.

title: Force of Evil
description: An unethical lawyer who wants to help his older brother becomes a partner with a client in the numbers racket.

title: Crossfire
description: A man is murdered, apparently by one of a group of demobilized soldiers he met in a bar. But which one? And why?

title: Black Hand
description: Now grown-up, Johnny Columbo returns to New York from Italy having sworn a vendetta against the Black Hand who killed his father years earlier. Becoming romantically involved with a girl from school and meeting up with an honest cop also fighting the gangs, Columbo starts to wonder if there may be legal ways to defeat them.

title: Suddenly
description: In the city of Suddenly, three gangsters trap the Benson family in their own house, on the top of a hill nearby the railroad station, with the intention of killing the president of the USA.

title: Hell Drivers
description: A rookie trucker tries to expose his boss' rackets.

title: Kansas City Confidential
description: An ex-con trying to go straight is framed for a million dollar armored car robbery and must go to Mexico in order to unmask the real culprits.

title: This Gun for Hire
description: When assassin Philip Raven shoots a blackmailer and his beautiful female companion dead, he is paid off in marked bills by his treasonous employer who is working with foreign spies.

title: All Through the Night
description: Runyonesque Broadway gamblers turn patriotic when they stumble onto a cell of Nazi saboteurs.

title: Black Legion
description: A hard-working machinist loses a promotion to a Polish-born worker, he's seduced into joining the secretive Black Legion, which intimidates foreigners through violence.

title: Possessed
description: After being found wandering the streets of Los Angeles, a severely catatonic woman tells a doctor the complex story of how she wound up there.

title: The House on Telegraph Hill
description: Concentration camp survivor Victoria Kowelska finds herself involved in mystery, greed, and murder after she assumes the identity of a dead friend in order to gain passage to America.

title: Knock on Any Door
description: An attorney defends a hoodlum of murder, using the oppressiveness of the slums to appeal to the court.

title: The Big Combo
description: A police lieutenant is ordered to stop investigating deadly crime boss Mr. Brown because he hasn't been able to get any hard evidence against him. He goes after Brown's girlfriend, who despises him, for information instead.

title: They Live by Night
description: An escaped convict, injured during a robbery, falls in love with the woman who nurses him back to health, but their relationship seems doomed from the beginning.

title: Caged
description: A gentle, naive, pregnant 19-year-old widow is slowly, inexorably ground down by the hardened criminals, sadistic guards, and matron at a woman's prison. Will she be the same person when her sentence is up?

title: The Bigamist
description: A man secretly married to two women feels the pressure of his deceit.

title: Sudden Fear
description: After an ambitious actor insinuates himself into the life of a wealthy middle-aged playwright and marries her, he plots with his mistress to murder her.

title: Sleep, My Love
description: Chronic sleepwalker Alison Courtland thinks that a mysterious man wearing horned-rimmed eye glasses is out to kill her but her husband blames her tired imagination.

title: Criss Cross
description: An armored truck driver and his ex-wife conspire with a gang to have his own truck robbed on the route.

title: The Blue Gardenia
description: A telephone operator ends up drunk and at the mercy of a cad in his apartment. The next morning she wakes up with a hangover and the terrible fear she may be a murderess.

title: The Maltese Falcon
description: A lovely dame with dangerous lies employs the services of a private detective, who is quickly caught up in the mystery and intrigue of a statuette known as the Maltese Falcon.

title: The Naked Street
description: A mobster (Quinn) springs a condemned murderer (Granger) because he got his sister (Bancroft) pregnant.

title: Impact
description: A unfaithful wife plots with her lover to kill her husband, but the lover is accidentally killed instead. The husband stays in hiding and lets his wife be charged with conspiracy.

title: T-Men
description: Two US Treasury agents hunt a successful counterfeiting ring.

title: House of Bamboo
description: Planted in a Tokyo crime syndicate, a U.S. Army Investigator attempts to probe the coinciding death of a fellow Army official.

title: Odd Man Out
description: A wounded Irish nationalist leader attempts to evade police following a failed robbery in Belfast.

title: The Other Love
description: Seriously ill, concert pianist Karen Duncan is admitted to a Swiss sanitorium. Despite being attracted to Dr Tony Stanton she ignores his warnings of possibly fatal consequences unless she rests completely. Rather, she opts for a livelier time in Monte Carlo with dashing Paul Clermont.

title: The Long Night
description: Police surround the apartment of apparent murderer Joe Adams, who refuses to surrender although escape appears impossible. During the siege, Joe reflects on the circumstances that led him to this situation.

title: Woman on the Run
description: Frank Johnson becomes an eyewitness to a murder. He's pursued around San Francisco by his wife, the police, and the killer.

title: Black Friday
description: Dr. Sovac transplants the brain of a gangster into his professor friend's body to save his life, but there is a side effect that causes a dangerous split personality.

title: Temptation
description: Ruby, a beautiful divorcee with a shady past, calculatingly marries rich Egyptologist Nigel Armine. He installs her at his Cairo estate while he continues his excavation work, but Ruby is hopelessly bored. A young woman of her acquaintance confides that she is being blackmailed over indiscreet letters she foolishly sent to a man called Baroudi, with whom she believed ...

title: Jail Bait
description: Vic Brady draws young Don Gregor into a life of crime. He then blackmails Gregor's plastic surgeon father into fixing up his face so he can evade the cops.

title: A Life at Stake
description: An out-of-work architect meets a married woman who has a business proposition for him. The architect begins to suspect that the woman's interest in him is not just financial and--and might actually be deadly.

title: The Big Clock
description: A magazine tycoon commits a murder and pins it on an innocent man, who then tries to solve the murder himself.

title: The Suspect
description: An unhappily married man begins a flirtation with a younger woman. When his wife threatens to ruin her, he decides to take action.

title: The Fallen Sparrow
description: In 1940, an American former Republican prisoner during the Spanish Civil War, John McKittrick, is determined to find the killer of NYPD Lieutenant Louie Lepetino, who had helped him escape.

title: Raw Deal
description: Joe Sullivan (Dennis O'Keefe) has taken the rap for Rick (Raymond Burr) who double-crosses him with a flawed escape plan and other means intended to get rid of him.

title: I Am a Fugitive from a Chain Gang
description: Wrongly convicted James Allen serves in the intolerable conditions of a Southern chain gang, which later comes back to haunt him.

title: Larceny
description: A con man sets out to swindle a widow out of the money she's received to build a memorial to her war-hero husband, but winds up falling in love with her instead.

title: Too Late for Tears
description: Through a fluke circumstance, a ruthless woman stumbles across a suitcase filled with $60,000, and is determined to hold onto it even if it means murder.

title: Ministry of Fear
description: Stephen Neale has just been released from an asylum during World War II in England when he accidentally stumbles onto a deadly Nazi spy plot and tries to stop it.

title: Born to Kill
description: A calculating divorcée risks her chances at wealth and security with a man she doesn't love by getting involved with the hotheaded murderer romancing her foster sister.

title: Shock
description: A psychologically distraught woman is committed to a private sanitarium by the man she witnessed commit a murder.

title: The Lost Moment
description: A publisher insinuates himself into the mouldering mansion of the centenarian lover of a renowned but long-dead poet to find his lost love letters.

title: They Drive by Night
description: When one of two truck-driving brothers loses an arm, they both join a transport company where the other is falsely charged as an accessory in the murder of the owner.

title: The Unsuspected
description: The secretary of an affably suave radio mystery host mysteriously commits suicide after his wealthy young niece disappears.

title: Angel Face
description: Ambulance driver Frank Jessup is ensnared in the schemes of the sensuous but dangerous Diane Tremayne.

title: Confidential Report
description: An elusive billionaire hires an American smuggler to investigate his past, leading to a dizzying descent into a cold-war European landscape.

title: On Dangerous Ground
description: Rough city cop Jim Wilson is disciplined by his captain and is sent upstate, to a snowy mountain town, to help the local sheriff solve a murder case.

title: The Big Steal
description: An army lieutenant accused of robbery pursues the real thief on a frantic chase through Mexico aided by the thief's fiancee.

title: Panic in the Streets
description: A doctor and a policeman in New Orleans have only 48 hours to locate a killer infected with pneumonic plague.

title: Cloak and Dagger
description: In WW2, the Allies race against time to persuade two nuclear scientists working for the Germans to switch sides.

title: All My Sons
description: During WW2, industrialist Joe Keller commits a crime and frames his business partner Herbert Deever but years later his sin comes back to haunt him when Joe's son plans to marry Deever's daughter.

title: Born to Be Bad
description: A woman's attempt to appear innocent and sweet clashes with her lover who sees through her act and the wealthy man she tries to trick into marrying her.

title: Conflict
description: An engineer trapped in an unhappy marriage murders his wife in the hope of marrying her younger sister.

title: Call Northside 777
description: Chicago reporter P.J. McNeal re-opens a decade-old murder case.

title: The Hidden Room
description: Clive Riordan plans a devilish revenge against his wife's lover.

title: Lady in the Lake
description: The lady editor of a crime magazine hires Phillip Marlowe to find the wife of her boss. The private detective soon finds himself involved in murder.

title: Ladies in Retirement
description: The housekeeper to a retired actress tries at the same time to look after her own two emotionally disturbed sisters, with dramatic results.

title: Secret Beyond the Door...
description: When a lovely woman and her new husband settle in an ancient mansion on the East coast, she discovers that he may want to kill her.

title: Nobody Lives Forever
description: Ex-GI Nick Blake gets involved in a scheme to fleece a rich, young widow, but finds himself falling for her, much to the displeasure of his racketeer cohorts.

title: Fury
description: When a wrongly-accused prisoner barely survives a lynch-mob attack and is presumed dead, he vindictively decides to fake his death and frame the mob for his supposed murder.

title: The Dark Corner
description: A secretary tries to help her boss who's been framed for murder.

title: Road House
description: A night club owner becomes infatuated with a torch singer and frames his best friend/manager for embezzlement when the chanteuse falls in love with him.

title: Terror by Night
description: When the fabled Star of Rhodesia diamond is stolen on a London to Edinburgh train and the son of its owner is murdered, Sherlock Holmes must discover which of his suspicious fellow passengers is responsible.

title: Lured
description: British police are after a serial killer who lures his female victims through newspaper personal ads and sends cryptic-poem clues to the cops.

title: The Window
description: To avoid the heat of a sweltering summer night a 9-year-old Manhattan boy decides to sleep on the fire escape and witnesses a murder, but no one will believe him.

title: The Falcon Out West
description: Detective Falcon and the police travel west to a ranch in Texas to try and solve the mystery of the murder by venom from a rattlesnake, in a New York City nightclub, of a Rich cattle baron.

title: Fingers at the Window
description: In Chicago, an unemployed actor aims to solve the mystery concerning a string of ax murders, apparently committed by a lunatic.

title: The House of Fear
description: Sherlock Holmes investigates a series of deaths at a castle with each foretold by the delivery of orange pips to the victims.

title: Champion
description: Boxer Midge Kelly rises to fame...mainly by stepping on other people.

title: He Walked by Night
description: This film-noir piece, told in semi-documentary style, follows police on the hunt for a resourceful criminal who shoots and kills a cop.

title: Phone Call from a Stranger
description: While awaiting a delayed flight, a lawyer who has left his unfaithful wife, befriends three fellow passengers. After the plane crashes and he is among the few to survive, he feels compelled to contact the families of his dead friends.

title: Storm Warning
description: Marsha Mitchell, a traveling dress model, stops in a southern town to see her sister who has married a Ku Klux Klansman. Marsha sees the KKK commit a murder and helps District Attorney Burt Rainey in bringing the criminals to justice.

title: Dementia
description: This film, with no dialogue at all, follows a psychotic young woman's nightmarish experiences through one skid-row night.

title: Hell Bound
description: After World War II, a Los Angeles crime ring uses a complex scheme, involving a freight ship, a junkie, and a corrupt health officer, to smuggle drugs into the USA.

title: The Glass Key
description: A crooked politician finds himself being accused of murder by a gangster from whom he refused help during a re-election campaign.

title: I Wake Up Screaming
description: Why is Inspector Ed Cornell trying to railroad Frankie Christopher for the murder of model Vicky Lynn?

title: M
description: In this Americanization of the 1931 German thriller, both the police and the criminal underworld stalk a mysterious killer who preys on small children.

title: Chicago Confidential
description: In Chicago, a crime syndicate tries to take over a labor union by killing its blow-whistler treasurer and framing the honest union boss for the murder.

title: The Set-Up
description: Expecting the usual loss, a boxing manager takes bribes from a betting gangster without telling his fighter.

title: Party Girl
description: Lawyer Tommy Farrell is a defender of crooks. Vicki Gaye encourages him to go straight, but mob king Rico Angelo insists otherwise.

title: The Man Between
description: In post-WW2 Berlin, when travel to the East was still possible, the sister of a British officer from West Berlin is abducted by Communist agents and taken into the Soviet sector where her eventual rescue is arranged by a German smuggler.

title: The Flame
description: A woman falls for the victim of an intended blackmail plot.

title: Violent Saturday
description: Three men case a small town very carefully, with plans to rob the bank on the upcoming Saturday, which turns violent and deadly.

title: The Dark Mirror
description: A man is found murdered, and witnesses are sure about the woman they saw leaving his apartment. However, it becomes apparent that the woman has a twin, and finding out which one is the killer seems impossible.

title: The Dark Past
description: An escaped psychopathic killer who takes the family and neighbors of police psychologist hostage reveals a recurring nightmare to the doctor.

title: No Man of Her Own
description: A pregnant woman adopts the identity of a railroad-crash victim and starts a new life with the woman's wealthy in-laws, but is soon blackmailed by her devious ex.

title: Pitfall
description: Married insurance adjuster John Forbes falls for femme fatale Mona Stevens while her boyfriend is in jail and all suffer serious consequences as a result.

title: Human Desire
description: A Korean War vet returns to his job as a railroad engineer and becomes involved in an affair with a co-worker's wife following a murder on a train where they meet.

title: Hit and Run
description: A mechanic wants his boss's younger wife for himself, and plans on using a junkyard car to run him over, then dismantling it.

title: Witness to Murder
description: A woman's sanity comes into question, after she claims to have witnessed a murder from her apartment window.

title: Sirocco
description: A cynical American expatriate gets involved in smuggling and gun-running for the rebels during the 1925 Syrian insurgency against French occupation.

title: Rope of Sand
description: A man abused by a sadistic mining company cop before he could tell where on their desert property he'd found diamonds decides to steal them instead.

title: The Female Animal
description: An aging film star and her alcoholic daughter compete for a handsome extra.

title: Tokyo Joe
description: An American returns to Tokyo try to pick up threads of his pre-WW2 life there, but finds himself squeezed between criminals and the authorities.

title: Thieves' Highway
description: A war veteran turned truck driver attempts to avenge the crippling and robbing of his father at the hands of an amoral produce scofflaw.

title: The Big Shot
description: Fearing life in prison for a fourth offense, convict Duke Berne pulls out of an armored car robbery, planned by his crooked lawyer, but he is framed for the robbery anyway.

title: The Narrow Margin
description: A woman planning to testify against the mob must be protected against their assassins on the train trip from Chicago to Los Angeles.

title: Beyond the Forest
description: Resentful of her small-town life, a married woman schemes to run off with a rich businessman.

title: While the City Sleeps
description: A serial killer has been killing beautiful women in New York and the new owner of a media company offers a high ranking job to the first of his senior executives who can get the earliest scoops on the case.

title: Invisible Stripes
description: An ex-con who wants to go straight has difficulties trying to reintegrate into society while on parole.

title: The Strange One
description: Students faced with an ethical dilemma about the dehumanization associated with the tradition of hazing, at a military college in the Southern United States, take matters in their own hands.

title: Not as a Stranger
description: An ego-driven, aspiring physician, intolerant of the weaknesses of others, especially those closest to him, comes to grips with his own imperfections.

title: Phantom Lady
description: A devoted secretary risks her life to try to find the elusive woman who may prove her boss didn't murder his selfish wife.

title: You Can't Get Away with Murder
description: Youthful tough Johnnie Stone has fallen under the influence of petty crook Frank Wilson, who involves him and robbery and murder using his sister's boyfriend's stolen gun.

title: Machine-Gun Kelly
description: The criminal exploits of Public Enemy number 1, George 'Machine-Gun' Kelly, during the 1930s.

title: Deadline - U.S.A.
description: With his newspaper about to be sold, crusading editor Ed Hutcheson tries to complete an exposé on gangster Rienzi.

title: Bullets or Ballots
description: When a crusader against rackets is murdered, a grand jury battles the rackets by promoting McLaren to be in charge of the cleanup. He fires NYPD Detective Blake, who punches him and joins the racket.

title: The Reckless Moment
description: After discovering the dead body of her teenage daughter's lover, a housewife takes desperate measures to protect her family from scandal.

title: The Big Knife
description: Hollywood actor Charles Castle is pressured by his studio boss into a criminal cover-up to protect his valuable career.

title: Body and Soul
description: A talented boxer's young career hits difficult terrain when an unethical promoter takes interest in him.

title: Railroaded!
description: A beautician and her crooked boyfriend attempt to rob the bookie operation located in the back room, but when the plan goes wrong, they frame an innocent man.

title: The Prowler
description: After Susan Gilvray reports a prowler outside her house police officer Webb Garwood investigates and sparks fly. If only her husband wasn't in the way.

title: Outrage
description: A young woman who has just become engaged has her life completely shattered when she is raped while on her way home from work.

title: Dark City
description: Gamblers who "took" an out-of-town sucker in a crooked poker game feel shadowy vengeance closing in on them.

title: Street of Chance
description: After an accident, a New York man with amnesia finds out the ugly truth about his real identity and past by interacting with people who seem to know him well.

title: Cast a Dark Shadow
description: A British fortune-hunter playboy is killing his rich wives in order to inherit their wealth.

title: Another Man's Poison
description: A mystery writer becomes involved in a tangled web of murderous deception not unlike the plots of her novels.

title: The Breaking Point
description: An otherwise moral captain of a charter boat becomes financially strapped and is drawn into illegal activities in order to keep up payments on his boat.

title: Cry of the City
description: Police Lieut. Candella, longtime friend of the Rome family, walks a tightrope in the case of cop-killer Martin Rome.

title: Dishonored Lady
description: A beautiful editor at a fashion magazine has a breakdown due to the pressures of her work and her disappointing love life. A psychiatrist recommends that she start life fresh by moving into a smaller apartment and under another name.

title: Somewhere in the Night
description: George Taylor returns from WWII with amnesia. Back home in Los Angeles, while trying to track down his old identity, he stumbles onto a 3-year old murder case and a hunt for a missing $2 million.

title: Kiss Tomorrow Goodbye
description: Starting with a violent prison break, clever, ruthless Ralph Cotter corrupts everyone around him.

title: No Orchids for Miss Blandish
description: John Blandish is worth $100 million. His heiress daughter is soon to be wed to Foster Harvey, who believes she's a cold, unfeeling woman, despite loving her. Her cold emotional state is in large part due to leading a restricted life. A low level thug named Johnny overhears their secret wedding night plans, and peddles the idea of robbing her of the $100,000 worth of d...

title: His Kind of Woman
description: A deported gangster's plan to re-enter the USA involves skulduggery at a Mexican resort, and gambler Dan Milner is caught in the middle.

title: Shakedown
description: Unscrupulous and opportunistic San Francisco news media photographer Jack Early steps on and uses folks to get ahead, but in the end he tangles with the wrong people.

title: The Sound of Fury
description: A man who is down on his luck falls in with a criminal.

title: Flamingo Road
description: A corrupt small town sheriff manipulates local candidates to the state legislature but he eventually comes into conflict with a visiting carnival dancer.

title: The Lineup
description: In San Francisco, a psychopathic gangster and his mentor retrieve heroin packages carried by unsuspecting travelers.

title: Mystery Junction
description: Larry Gordon, well-known crime writer, is on a train journey when a scream is heard. Upon investigation, the guard had been mugged and a man murdered. Another man is arrested but the full story is yet to be discovered.

title: Black Angel
description: When Kirk Bennett is convicted of a singer's murder, his wife tries to prove him innocent...aided by the victim's ex-husband.

title: They Won't Believe Me
description: On trial for murdering his girlfriend, philandering stockbroker Larry Ballentine takes the stand to claim his innocence and describe the actual, but improbable-sounding, sequence of events that led to her death.

title: Tight Spot
description: A female inmate is whisked out of prison and into a police-guarded hotel until the district attorney can convince her to testify against the mob.

title: He Ran All the Way
description: Nick and his partner Al stage a payroll holdup. Al is shot and Nick kills a policeman. Nick hides out at a public pool, where he meets Peg Dobbs. They go back to her apartment and he forces her family to hide him from the police manhunt.

title: 711 Ocean Drive
description: An electronics expert creates a huge bookie broadcast system for his crime boss, and takes over operations when his boss is murdered. His greed leads him on a deadly destructive path.

title: A Double Life
description: A celebrated actor struggles to distinguish his own life from that of his most recent stage role, Othello.

title: Hollow Triumph
description: Pursued by the big-time gambler he robbed, John Muller assumes a new identity, with unfortunate results.

title: The Web
description: An attorney acting as a body guard, apparently kills a man in defense of his employer's life, and later believes the victim was set up to be murdered.

title: Night Has a Thousand Eyes
description: After phony stage mentalist Triton mysteriously acquires supernatural powers of precognition, he becomes frightened and abandons his act to live in anonymity.

title: House by the River
description: A deranged writer murders a maid after she resists his advances. The writer engages his brother's help in hiding the body, causing unexpected problems for both of them.

title: The Damned Don't Cry
description: A New York socialite climbs the ladder of success man by man until a life among rich gangsters gives her what she thought she always wanted.

title: Blackout
description: An American in London, down on his luck, runs into a beautiful blonde in a bar who offers him a lot of money to marry her. Broke and unemployed, he takes her up on it. When he wakes up the next day, he finds himself in a strange room that turns out to be an artist's studio, there is blood on his coat, and he discovers that his new "wife's" father had been murdered the...

title: San Quentin
description: An army trainer becomes captain of the prison yard and in time, falls for the sister of a hardened inmate.

title: The Shanghai Gesture
description: In Shanghai, dragon-lady 'Mother' Gin Sling operates a gambling house for wealthy patrons but she clashes with influential land developer Sir Guy Charteris who wants to put her out-of-business.

title: The Mob
description: Johnny Damico botches a murder case and is suspended from the force. In reality, he is put undercover to identify the mysterious boss of the NY waterfront who has murdered everyone in his way. Will Johnny be next in line?

title: The Unfaithful
description: A Los Angeles socialite kills a man while home alone one night and claims he was an intruder she did not know. It seems like a clear case of self defense until the story hits the papers and people connected to the dead man come forward.

title: The Second Woman
description: In flashback from a 'Rebecca'-style beginning: Ellen Foster, visiting her aunt on the California coast, meets neighbor Jeff Cohalan and his ultramodern clifftop house.

title: Deception
description: After marrying her long-lost love, a musician finds the relationship threatened by a wealthy composer who is besotted with her.

title: Among the Living
description: A mentally unstable man, who has been kept in isolation for years, escapes and causes trouble for his identical twin brother.

title: A Woman's Face
description: A female blackmailer with a disfiguring facial scar meets a plastic surgeon who offers her the possibility of looking like a normal woman.

title: The Violent Years
description: Paula Parkins is the teenage daughter of wealthy parents who can't seem to make time for her, so she looks for thrills as the leader of her all girl-gang who rob and rape young men.

title: Desert Fury
description: The daughter of a Nevada casino owner gets involved with a racketeer, despite everyone's efforts to separate them.

title: Fourteen Hours
description: An unhappy man threatens suicide by standing on the ledge of a high-rise building for 14 hours.

title: Macao
description: Nick Cochran, an American in exile in Macao, has a chance to restore his name by helping capture an international crime lord. Undercover, can he mislead the bad guys and still woo the attractive singer/petty crook, Julie Benson?

title: Black Widow
description: A young writer insinuates herself into the life of a Broadway producer.

title: Quicksand
description: After taking 20 dollars from his employer to go on a date with plans to repay it the next day, an auto mechanic falls into increasingly disastrous circumstances for more and more money which rapidly spirals out of his control.

title: The Amazing Mr. X
description: On the beach one night, Christine Faber, two years a widow, thinks she hears her late husband Paul calling out of the surf; then meets a tall dark man Alexis, who seems to know all about such things.

title: Trapped
description: Secret Service agents make a deal with a counterfeiting inmate to be released on early parole if he will help them recover some bogus moneymaking plates, but he plans to double cross them.

title: Intruder in the Dust
description: In 1940s Mississippi, two teenage boys and an elderly woman combine forces to prevent a miscarriage of justice and clear a black man of a murder charge.

title: Undercurrent
description: Middle-aged bride Ann Hamilton soon begins to suspect that her charming husband is really a psychotic who plans to murder her.

title: The Sniper
description: A sniper kills young brunettes as the police attempt to grapple with the psychology of the unknown assailant.

title: Cry Terror!
description: Duped by former army pal Paul Hoplin into building a time-bomb, New York shop owner Jim Molner and his family become hostages of Hoplin who uses bomb-threats to extort money from airlines.

title: The Strange Affair of Uncle Harry
description: Bachelor Harry Quincey, head designer in a small-town cloth factory, lives with his selfish sisters, glamorous hypochondriac Lettie and querulous widow Hester. His developing relationship with new colleague Deborah Brown promises happiness at last...thwarted by passive, then increasingly active opposition from one sister. Will Harry resort to desperate measures?

title: The House on 92nd Street
description: Bill Dietrich becomes a double agent for the F.B.I. in a Nazi spy ring.

title: 5 Against the House
description: Four vets attending college on the GI Bill and a cabaret singer try to rob a Reno Casino and pull off the perfect crime.

title: Moontide
description: In California, Bobo and his mooching 'pal' Tiny are doing odd jobs and getting drunk and they hide a secret about the unsolved murder of sailor Pop Kelly but suicidal waitress Anna, saved by Bobo, unravels the mystery.

title: Ride the Pink Horse
description: WW2 veteran Lucky Gagin arrives in a New Mexico border-town intent on revenging against mobster Frank Hugo but FBI agent Bill Retz, who also wants Hugo, tries to keep Gagin out of trouble.

title: Vicki
description: The untimely murder of a New York glamor-girl sparks an investigation with an emotionally driven detective at the helm.

title: The Chase
description: Chuck Scott gets a job as chauffeur to tough guy Eddie Roman; but Chuck's involvement with Eddie's fearful wife becomes a nightmare.

title: Shockproof
description: A Parole Officer falls in-love with his client, a ravishing blonde who served time for murder, and he's determined to help her go straight despite her interfering criminal boyfriend.

title: The Scarlet Hour
description: An unhappy wife uses her powers of manipulation to draw an infatuated man into an ill-fated jewelry heist.

title: Bodyguard
description: After being fired for insubordination, homicide detective Mike Carter is hired as bodyguard by the owner of a local meat-packing plant where a meat inspector has been murdered.

title: Nightfall
description: Through a series of bizarre coincidences, an artist finds himself falsely accused of bank robbery and murder and is pursued by the authorities and the real killers.

title: Nocturne
description: In 1940s Los Angeles, when womanizing composer Keith Vincent is found dead, the inquest concludes it was a suicide but police detective Joe Warne isn't so sure.

title: Crime of Passion
description: Kathy leaves the newspaper business to marry homicide detective Bill but is frustrated by his lack of ambition and the banality of life in the suburbs. Her drive to advance Bill's career soon takes her down a dangerous path.

title: Tension
description: A meek pharmacist creates an alternate identity under which he plans to murder the bullying liquor salesman who has become his wife's lover.

title: I Walk Alone
description: Frankie Madison leaves prison expecting a share from his ex-partner. But Prohibition bootlegging didn't prepare Frankie for Big Business.

title: Women's Prison
description: A sadistic prison warden takes out her sexual frustration on her women inmates. While a caring physician tries to improve the jail's brutal atmosphere, a pair of rebellious inmates take matters into their own hands.

title: Crime Wave
description: Reformed parolee Steve Lacey is caught in the middle when a wounded former cellmate seeks him out for shelter.

title: The Locket
description: Just before a wedding, the bridegroom hears a complex tale painting his lovely bride as devilish and unbalanced.

title: Framed
description: Mike Lambert, seeking a mining job, instead becomes the patsy for a femme-fatale's schemes.

title: The Crooked Web
description: Government agent tries to trick a suspect into returning to Germany, the scene of his crimes.

title: High Tide
description: A fast-moving automobile fails to make a sharp turn of the highway from Malibu to Los Angeles. It overturns and its occupants, Tim Slade, Newspaper man turned private investigator, and Hugh Fresney, managing editor of the Los Angeles Currier, are pinned underneath. Both are seriously injured and are unable to move. As they wait for the tide to come in and cover them, ...

title: Naked Alibi
description: A chief of police detectives fired for brutality, tries to get evidence on a man suspected of killing 3 of his officers.

title: My Name Is Julia Ross
description: Julia Ross secures employment, through a rather nosy employment agency, with a wealthy widow, Mrs. Hughes, and goes to live at her house. 2 days later, she awakens - in a different house, in different clothes, and with a new identity. She's told she is the daughter-in-law of Mrs. Hughes, and has suffered a nervous breakdown. Is Julia really 'Julia', or, is it true tha...

title: A Blueprint for Murder
description: Whitney Cameron suspects his sister-in-law has poisoned his brother and niece, but without proof how does he prevent the murder of his nephew?

title: The Garment Jungle
description: The struggle of a lady's garment workers' organization to unionize a New York clothing sweat shop; the owner of which is determined to keep the union out of his business at any cost.

title: City Streets
description: Man joins a gang to free his girlfriend from prison.

title: 99 River Street
description: A former boxer turned cab driver has to hide from the police when his badgering wife is murdered by the jewel thief she was having an affair with.

title: I, the Jury
description: Dectective Mike Hammer is determined to catch and kill the person who shot his close friend dead, so he follows clues that lead to a beautiful, seductive woman.

title: Cry Danger
description: Ex-con Rocky Mulloy seeks the real culprit in the crime for which he was framed in a night world of deceptive dames and double crosses.

title: Beyond a Reasonable Doubt
description: A novelist aided by his future father-in-law conspires to frame himself for the murder of a burlesque dancer as part of an effort to ban capital punishment.

title: The Long Haul
description: After leaving his U.S. Army job in Germany, a trucker takes a long-haul driver job in Britain where he runs into an organized-crime syndicate that controls the trucking industry.

title: Calcutta
description: Neale and Pedro fly cargo between Chungking and Calcutta. When their buddy Bill is murdered they investigate. Neale meets Bill's fiancée Virginia and becomes suspicious of a deeper plot while also falling for her charms.
